about_the_game:
What is Duckified: Cosmic Legends?
Cosmic Legends is a side-scrolling platformer adventure game with elements of timed racing, puzzles, boss-fights, and musical numbers. The game is inspired by the likes of Rayman: Legends, Pizza Tower, and Sonic. The game also contains a Co-Op Multiplayer Mode and Online PVP Minigames, alongside the main Story Mode. The game will also encompass multiple other gaming genres such as racing, rhythm, etc.



What's the plot?
In a world where a tribe of 300 ducks lives alone on a random planet: their leader and prince of, Joe Duck, is basking under the sun. When suddenly, his long lost brother bursts out of the ground, breaks his magical bracelet, and sends him shooting across the multiverse. He now has to fight his way back, searching timelines for his bracelet pieces, and on his way home to challenge his chaotic brother.



How long is the Story Mode?
The planned Story Mode will have about 12 Universes, with 1 or 2 secret ones. Each will have 6-8 levels and a boss fight (or two) at the end.

name: Duckified: Cosmic Legends

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 12th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-12700H 2.3GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 Laptop GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X 8-Core Processor
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • Storage: 930 GB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition Audio Device

short_description: Duckified: Cosmic Legends is meant to be a fast paced game all about the multiverse, with a whole lot of ducks!
